title: Allow Negative Inertia Tensor Elements in Model Editor Link Inspector GUI

content.raw:
It seems to be not allowed to enter a negative value for the inertia tensor elements in the link inspector.  This is fine for the moments of inertia (the Ixx, Iyy, Izz ones), but the other ones (e.g. Ixy) can be negative sometimes.
reference: http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/aeronautics-and-astronautics/16-07-dynamics-fall-2009/lecture-notes/MIT16_07F09_Lec26.pdf
